title: Adaptive Feedback-Based Virtual Field Learning Design for Earth Science

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational earth science theory and mathematical analytical skills
context.additional_context: Virtual environment implementation to overcome field learning accessibility limitations. Applies adaptive learning systems using digital devices

learning_goals: Analyze 3D terrain data on a virtual fieldwork platform to interpret geological structures with 85% accuracy
Utilize an adaptive feedback system to reduce errors in field survey design to two or fewer within 72 hours
Through PBL team projects, apply actual field survey methodologies to write academic reports and achieve a peer assessment score of 4.0/5.0 or higher
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
